name: Matching Madness - Animals
description:
"Matching Madness - Animals" is a visual memory game. You are supposed to find the pair of each card facing down. You will be given a short period of time to memorize some their locations. Let's see how many can you memorize and how fast can you finish the levels. By the way, levels will be formed randomly for every game.

Challenge yourself, choose your level of expertise and have fun.

There are 4 different levels of expertise:

- Easy (4x4)
- Medium (5x5)
- Difficult (6x6)
- Expert (Against Time)

You will have 90 seconds in the against time mode. Memorize and pair cards as much as you can. Your score will be calculated according to your successful and unsuccessful attempts.

High scores are recorded.

Simply click the cards to turn, match the pair, and enjoy!



Pedagogical

Develops memory, concentration, motor skill, creativity.

Does not contain harmful images or ads.

Little players will become familiar with animals.



Technical

The size of the app is just 35 MB.

High-quality graphics.

You can turn on/off the sounds.

Suitable for both iPhone and iPad.
